message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it can bring to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go lower than $9,000. This product is truly valuable and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $8,200, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
